lead_paragraph: Spencer Hawes, the Sacramento Kings’ rookie center, will have arthroscopic surgery on his left knee today. No timetable was given for his return. Hawes, a 7-foot center out of Washington and the 10th pick over all in the draft, had surgery on the same knee when he was 14.
